name: Don Flood
biography: Don Flood is a celebrity photographer based in Los Angeles whose photographs have appeared in magazines including Vanity Fair, Esquire, and Marie Claire. His portraits include Jennifer Lawrence, Naomi Watts & Eva Mendez, and he has photographed hi-profile recording artists including Janet Jackson, Snoop Dog, Fergie and Adam Lambert for magazine covers and compact discs. His beauty and fashion clients include Cover Girl, Victoria’s Secret, and Clairol. He started developing his wallpaper collection about a year ago and all his designs are based on elements found in nature, captured by hi-res photography.
